Translations.Name: AExtremeStormsDesc
Translations.ZHCN: ${PlanetName}的大气中频繁发生规模巨大的极端风暴。一些周期较长的风暴在轨道上即可见，当中的风速最高可超过700米/秒。造成风暴的原因目前还不清楚，在气象模型中没有发现能够解释这一现象的线索。传感器会持续关注这一异常现象。
Translations.ENUS: Extreme storms of significant size occur frequently in the ${PlanetName} atmosphere. Some of the longer-period storms are visible from orbit, where wind speeds can exceed 700 m/s. The cause of the storms is not yet known and we have found no clues in meteorological models to explain this phenomenon. Sensors will continue to monitor this anomaly.

Translations.Name: AEffectsName1
Translations.ZHCN: 尽可能收集表面的液态氢。
Translations.ENUS: Collect as much surface liquid hydrogen as possible.
